programme.title: Michael And Madonna 2
programme.desc: Michael, a student, enters the school's faculty room to find an answer sheet for his exam so he can cheat. However, in his pursuit of deception, he gets accused of a crime he did not commit.

Anton and Erika have been a couple for 12 years. While he's not yet ready to get married, Erika waits until he is and lovingly devotes her time to him. When Anton finally asks her to, will she say yes?

programme.title: Samson & Goliath
programme.desc: Cousins Samson and Goliath fall in love with the daughters of their boss. When the two women get kidnapped by an enemy of their family, Samson and Goliath take it upon themselves to rescue them.

programme.title: Bes And the Beshies
programme.desc: A single mother, a neglected wife, a mistress and a beauty pageant contestant form a close friendship and get into various misadventures.

programme.title: Sakaling maging tayo
programme.desc: Two college freshmen meet on their last day of school and decide to play a game of dares that eventually forces them to confront their issues, leading to the start of a possible romance.

programme.title: Bala ko... Bahala sa 'yo
programme.desc: After being suspended from the police force for botching up a hostage rescue operation, a cop and his assistant decide to take the law into their own hands and exact punishment on a dollar racketing gang. But they face resistance from the underworld.

programme.title: Bagong Buwan
programme.desc: In the Philippines, a Muslim doctor (Cesar Montano) and his wife (Amy Austria) try to lead refugees to safety after vigilantes destroy their village.

programme.title: T.2.
programme.desc: A volunteer taking care of a young girl learns she is being stalked by Engkantos putting their lives at risk.

programme.title: Unexpectedly Yours
programme.desc: Two former high school friends renew their relationship when they make the happy discovery that they are now neighbors.

programme.desc: The lives of lovelorn people in Manila intertwine as they set out in pursuit of love and face struggles with their relationship expectations.

programme.title: The Unmarried Wife
programme.desc: A woman's affections are torn between her husband and lover.

programme.title: Papa's Girl

programme.title: Yakapin Mo Ang Umaga

programme.title: Magchumikap Ka

programme.title: Iyo ang Hong Kong, akin ang Manila!

programme.desc: A woman tolerates her husband's sadistic lifestyle. She begins an extramarital affair with her husband's right-hand man after being disenchanted by her marriage.

programme.title: Sta. Nia
programme.desc: A man decides to dig up the coffin of his daughter and finds her body unscathed. He brings her body home, and the villagers suffering from problems are healed when they go near her corpse.

programme.title: Sukob

programme.title: The Policeman's Lineage
programme.desc: A criminal drama of the very different two policemen handling a huge case together shakes the police organization.

programme.title: The Young Master
programme.desc: After failing in a Lion Dance competition, Dragon is sent away from school to find his errant brother.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

programme.title: Urban Myths
programme.desc: Seoulgoedam (literally meaning Seoul Ghost Stories), is a horror anthology film that focuses on Korean folklore that has been passed down from generation to generation.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

programme.title: One True Loves
programme.desc: A woman is unexpectedly forced to choose between the husband she has long thought dead and the fiance who has finally brought her back to life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Showcasing some of natures most incredible animal minds, whose brains demonstrate high intelligence, enabling them to gain advantage of their competition.

programme.title: Laws Of The Lizard
programme.desc: Meet the creature that scientists believe is the key to the story of life and how it evolves: the anole.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu heads to Hong Kong, the fourth country on his around the world tour, and he has some great food excursions lined up. Chicken feet, Tim Ho Wan, street food and lots to fit in before he jumps across the pond to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: As Manu heads past his halfway mark on his journey around the world, he heads to Tokyo to explore the bustling city. It is a massive challenge and he is having the time of his life but how is that budget going?

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the bizarre demise of the worlds most famous magician. Watch experts recreate Houdinis legendary escapes to determine whether his death was accidental, or if he was the victim of a powerful group that wanted him dead.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the details behind the death of the worlds most powerful drug lord. Examine new documents, videotapes, and an interview with Escobars son to reveal who fired the fatal shot when Escobar went down in a hail of bullets.

programme.title: Samuel L. Jackson: Did I Stutter?
programme.desc: With a work ethic like no other, it's hard to doubt Samuel L. Jacksons status as one of the most prominent figures in cinematic history. Follow the legend of the marvel actor as he continues to capture the hearts of fans all world the over.

programme.title: Robert Downey Jr: High Altitude
programme.desc: When we think of a prolific, yet tumultuous career in Hollywood A name stands out amongst the crowd. From his hardships to his incredible retribution This is Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Ryan Reynolds: Funny Business
programme.desc: "Ryan Reynolds: Funny Business" is a documentary tracing the actor's rise from Vancouver to Hollywood, exploring his comedic evolution, personal life, mental health, philanthropy, and social media mastery.

programme.title: Michael J. Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
programme.desc: Michael J. Fox's life, from his rise to fame to a Parkinson's diagnosis at 29, has been nothing short of a real-life movie, marked by unexpected twists and remarkable resilience.

programme.title: Zero To Macao
programme.desc: Amateur driver Vivian Siu chases her dream of racing the Macau Grand Prix. Self-funded and with minimal experience, she quickly jumps to Formula 4, becoming the first female driver in the Chinese Championship. She faces the huge challenge of driving skill and finding crucial funding.

programme.title: Zero To Macao
programme.desc: Warrens next stop on his food trail is Tswalu Nature Reserve, in the heart of the Kalahari Desert. Warren then meets with acclaimed Chef Marnus to cook up some exciting South African delicacies.

programme.title: Bruce Lee: The Way Of The Warrior
programme.desc: Warren is heading out of Cape Town into the more quiet coastal area of the Western Cape, and the picturesque town of Paternoster. Its here hell marvel at the seaside village feel and take an e-bike ride along the beach.

programme.title: Samuel L. Jackson: Did I Stutter?
programme.desc: As the final stanza in Warrens Food Trail of South Africa, hes back in the bush, a quintessential part of all travel to the rainbow nation.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: Warren heads to the coastal city of Durban - where hes staying at the iconic Oyster Box hotel.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: In Durban, Warren visits the famous restaurant Maxs Lifestyle for an indulgent Shisa Nyama experience, before meeting with local guide Thoko to visit a nearby Zulu village.

programme.title: Robert Downey Jr: High Altitude
programme.desc: Warrens next stop on his food trail is Kruger National Park, one of South Africas largest game reserves, where hes staying at the renowned Sabi Sabi lodge.

programme.title: Ryan Reynolds: Funny Business
programme.desc: In the heart of the Kalahari Desert, Warren spots a myriad of African animals, and learns to make traditional rusks to go with his morning coffee.

programme.title: Michael J. Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
programme.desc: Warren stops off at the historic city of Pretoria, where he visits the local farmers markets and cooks Koeksisters - South African sticky donuts - with Pastry Chef Nonkosi.

programme.title: Zero To Macao
programme.desc: Warren is in the bustling city of Johannesburg, and his first stop is the vibrant township of Soweto. Hes taken on a tuk tuk tour by his guide Sindi, and cooks up his version of Chakalala, a South African vegetable relish.

programme.title: Zero To Macao
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattles seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: Bruce Lee: The Way Of The Warrior
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the worlds first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where hell visit Newton Johnson, the wine farm with a view.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. programme.desc: In this third episode, Simon focuses on some of the incredible wildlife stories he's encountered.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka 1
programme.desc: The presenter heads for the paradise isle of the Indian Ocean, discovering its golden sands and historic culture, visiting the fortress town of Galle, a mask making factory and an elephant sanctuary.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure 1
programme.desc: British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Solar System 1
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox explores the solar system's wildest weather, encountering powerful lightning, strange metallic frosts and monsoon rains on a moon a billion kilometres from Earth.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II 2
programme.desc: Frozen Planet returns with a spellbinding journey through magical icy lands.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia 1
programme.desc: Magical forests wrap around a labyrinth of waterways in Scandinavia's heartlands. Here, lynxes, wolves and reindeer survive the ever-changing seasons through surprising alliances.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. Just as the mission is completed and they prepare to leave, Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured. Determined to save her, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and rescue her.

programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: In this episode Rachael's in party mode and she's firing up popcorn with popcorn chicken and if you like those both super spicy, you're in the right place at the right time.

programme.title: An Amish Sin
programme.desc: Rachel refuses to obey her parents' command to marry the man who abused her. She is sent to "rehab" for girls who don't follow the rules. Managing to escape, she must learn to find her place in world.

programme.title: My Child Has My Doctor's Face
programme.desc: Jessica and Dylan are happy parents to young Henry, but when Jessica learns that her fertility doctor is actually Henry's biological father, she pulls out all the stops to bring him to justice.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions continue as chefs from the Midwest battle it out for a coveted spot in the top 20. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael takes us on a Grecian adventure with a recipe for Greek-style lamb meatballs and her very own creation, feta-sghetti, a spaghetti dish served with a decadent white feta sauce.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: On day two, the Dokbakz head to Jervis Bay, a popular vacation spot for locals. This time, they are in for something special: their first-ever road trip with a rental car to their destination.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two legendary restaurants that have been open for over 100 years: McGillin's Old Ale House in Philadelphia, and Katz's Deli in New York City!

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two generational legacies - family owned and operated Patsy's Italian Restaurant in New York City and the famed Oaxacan joint in Los Angeles, Guelaguetza.

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2)
programme.desc: Yuri has been passionately posting home-cooked food on her Instagram account. Is there any better way to fall in love with cooking than experimenting with new recipes and sharing them with viewers?

programme.title: Babaylan
programme.desc: An immortal woman falls for a dashing young man, without her knowing that his ancestor was her lover in the past. They must work together to escape an insane man who's after her fountain of youth.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Super B
programme.desc: Bi (Rufa Mae) is an ordinary girl wanting to make a difference. Lord (Marvin Agustin), Bi's long time suitor gave her a mysterious ring, which if worn by the right person can yield special powers. She soon becomes Super B, a super hero who helps the distressed.

programme.title: Jeannie, Bakit Ngayon Ka Lang
programme.desc: A story of an ill-fated OFW whose hopes are once more afloat by a genie..the one that hes been waiting forever.

programme.title: Hustler
programme.desc: George is an excellent pool player and has in fact, established a reputation in the field of billiards. Later, he decided to take advantage of his talent and used the sport as a source of living.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Through Night and Day
programme.desc: Ben and Jen's relationship is put to test as they embark on a trip of a lifetime to Jen's lifelong dream destination - Iceland.

programme.title: Adarna Gang
programme.desc: Seeking justice, Adriana (Coleen Garcia) vows to take revenge on the family that killed her father - her target: the patriarch and his three sons Juan (JC Santos), Diego (Diego Loyzaga) and Pedro (Mark Anthony Fernandez).

programme.title: The Wife
programme.desc: A couple's marriage gets tainted as the husband cheats. How can the wife take her husband's dying plea to be with her and his mistress at the remaining days of his life?

programme.title: Dama De Noche
programme.desc: She has everything a woman could ask for but despite all that, there remains a craving in her, an itch that desperately wants to be scratched. So without her husband's knowledge, she leaves home everyday searching for men who can satisfy her insatiable appetite for the flesh.

programme.title: Torotot
programme.desc: Torotot explores the story of two couples, why and how their marriages crumble and how their infidelity and passions have brought them tragic endings.

programme.title: Kuman Thong (Black Magic Baby)
programme.desc: The film is about a mother who loses her son in a tragedy and she wanted to bring him back. The mother resorts to a Kuman Thong statue, however things did not go as intended.

programme.title: Christmas in Vienna
programme.desc: Jess, a concert violinist whose heart just isn't in it anymore, goes to Vienna for a performance. While there, she finds the inspiration she has been missing, and a new love.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E11 - The Brothers
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E06 - World War I (Part 2)
programme.desc: The dramatization of Alex Haley's family line from post Civil War America to the writer's search for his roots.

programme.title: Married With Children S5 E17 - Oldies But Young 'Uns
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E23 - Tabitha's Weekend
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S12 E18 - Bully
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: CSI S5 E12 - Snakes
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), theres something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E19 - The Gym Teacher
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, shes shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.desc: When Max and his friends think a monster is out to ruin their sleepover, Max volunteers 'brave' Sharkdog to investigate.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are building their biggest construction project ever... a skyscraper! And a job that huge calls for brand-new, mega-sized construction vehicles! But when Speed Meister sees the pups' big trucks, he calls in help from his big brother.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure. // It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town. // Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim tries to be at two parties at once. // Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. // After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.desc: George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Max erase Mom's latest video report they decide to reshoot it themselves with some help form the Sharkpack.

programme.desc: When Sharkdog gets tired of being Mia's favorite thing to squeeze, he gets her a sharkdog toy but quickly gets jealous of the attention she shows it.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max plans a day of fun for Sharkdog, but Sharkdog is distracted when he finds a map that could lead to finding more sharkdogs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew steps in to help at Hotel Hadley after a snowy surprise. But when the stairs aren't fast enough, it's time to bow wow build!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken accidentally shrinks Dora and Boots so it's up to Dora's little brother and sister to help get them big again. // Dora rescues Boots and her friends from Benny's out-of-control balloon so they can all go to La Reina's castle party.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. // Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. // Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.desc: Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: One happy couple; four dysfunctional, divorced parents who all insist on celebrating with their kids; a single, well-planned, happy day quickly spins out of control in to the madcap whirlwind of Four Christmases.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible "Man With No Name" in a lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money. Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach also star in this renowned western.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: A middle-aged wife and mother has an affair with a handsome younger man, but her husband murders him when he finds out about the affair, and husband and wife must reckon with what happened.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a misplaced present to a young girl in less than two hours on Christmas Day.

programme.title: Four Christmases

programme.title: Road House (1989)
programme.desc: A legendary bouncer comes to restore order at a notorious bar but runs afoul of a ruthless crime boss who controls the town.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven master gunmen pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing action tale that launched the film careers of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson and James Coburn.

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: When professional photographer J.B. Jeff Jeffries is confined to a wheelchair, he becomes obsessed with watching the private dramas of his neighbours play out across the courtyard.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villas dark secrets.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villas dark secrets.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gales class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gales class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Jim has been a collector from a very young age but some of the tragedies in his life have compounded Jim's hoarding behavior.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: The wife claims she has no memory of wounding him, but when the police investigate, she is charged with second-degree murder. Is she a murderous wife or a battered spouse?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: Folks in Anchorage, Alaska, are shaken to their core when a popular barista goes missing from the town's favourite coffee shop.

programme.title: Asian Swindlers (S1)
programme.desc: Nathan Oman is a Thai celebrity and a former singer who was released from Loei prison last year after serving ten months for using his fame and charm to swindle more than $31,000 from trusting people.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A boater goes off the deep end; a naked man causes traffic chaos; a police uniform-swiper gets taken to the cleaners; and more!

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: This articulate and boastful killer is remembered for terrifying the coastal town of Santa Cruz in the early 1970s, but his desire to kill started when he was a young child fantasising about murder.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Growing up gay in the hyper-masculine Bayou was tough on Ronald Dominique. An inability to connect and a prison sexual assault would cement his decision to ultimately kill his first victim.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Investigators trying to determine who shot and killed a young mother in Ohio are tipped off by a surprising piece of digital evidence. They unravel a twisted story of stalking and social media catfishing.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jim's daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi Jones motherless. Nearly 40 years later, Heidi vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the supposed great-niece of Marilyn Monroe, Krystal Jean Baker, 13, is found dead beneath a bridge in Texas' Bayou Country, investigators are stumped.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: An online pimple popper is accused of in-court drug use; a judge mutes a foul-mouthed murderer; a woman stabs her husband 14 times before calling 911; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The family of a DUI victim screams at the defendant; a Sovereign Citizen argues with the judge over bond; a sexual assault victim is interviewed by her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: After a 14-year-old boy is shot to death outside of a friend's house, detectives wonder if he was caught in the middle of a sinister plot.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a brazen gunman shoots another man in front of gas station security cameras, and in Gwinnett County, detectives race to identify a woman shot on the side of the road and track down her killer.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Detectives in Tulsa have only one witness to a domestic dispute that's escalated to a double homicide a 12-year-old girl. Their case hangs on this question: will she or won't she be able to testify?

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A frightening assault ends in tragedy when teenagers shoot splat ball guns at two brothers playing a nighttime basketball game. A fight ensues between the youths, leaving a 17-year-old dead at the scene.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A man falls asleep while driving and kills a construction worker on the road. Was he a reckless driver or an innocent man with an undiagnosed medical condition?

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Aged 7, Sakina M'sa left her birthplace of Comoros for Marseille, going from gentle childhood to the reality of inner-city housing. Already as a teenager, she dreamt of fashion. Next, she fled an arranged marriage and moved to Paris, where she protested and launched a totally sustainable and inclusive brand.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Cte Vol D'Oiseau
programme.desc: Starting from the Zwin Nature Park in Belgium, on the border with the Netherlands, a flight over the Belgian coast. An opportunity to witness the grand ballet of bird migrations heading toward the French dunes further south.

programme.title: C'Est Succulent !
programme.desc: Lela Albert welcomes Dominique Hnon, a French variety and gypsy jazz singer, into her kitchen. She shares her version of breakfast, which consists of a creamy, indulgent rice pudding, brioche pudding and strawberry coulis.

programme.title: Version Franaise
programme.desc: In the heart of Brittany, visit the Pont-Aven museum. Interior design and a passion for cinema come together in Sandra Benhamou's world. Lacoste reinvents itself under the leadership of Pelagia Kolotouros. Patient and meticulous, restorer Marie-Ccile Kfouri brings frescoes and old canvases back to life.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Tlvisions editorial team.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: C'Est Succulent !
programme.desc: Lela Albert welcomes Dominique Hnon, a French variety and gypsy jazz singer, into her kitchen. She shares her version of breakfast, which consists of a creamy, indulgent rice pudding, brioche pudding and strawberry coulis.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Tljournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Cte Vol D'Oiseau
programme.desc: Starting from the Zwin Nature Park in Belgium, on the border with the Netherlands, a flight over the Belgian coast. An opportunity to witness the grand ballet of bird migrations heading toward the French dunes further south.

programme.title: Le Got Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Bote !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Ytili
programme.desc: Nina and Lon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Ytili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Ytili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Ptole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itinraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.title: Temps Prsent
programme.desc: 'Temps Prsent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: False information, addictive screens, disrupted sleep: our overloaded brain struggles to tell truth from falsehood. How can we resist these pressures and maintain our balance? What tools and habits should we adopt to protect it? And what do the latest studies reveal about our grey matter?

programme.title: Un Chteau En Cadeau
programme.desc: Andr Manoukian invites his friend Bruno Solo for an extraordinary Christmas in the Chteau de Chenonceau. The pair share the magic of the festive season with a host of other guests on this uniquely enchanting journey.

programme.title: chappes Belles
programme.desc: At first glance, Tokyo sweeps us away in a whirlwind of images, blinding lights, giant advertisements. Its architectural chaos, its nameless streets, its crowded sidewalks can easily confuse the traveler. Within a few meters, one can even change century and atmosphere completely... Yet this apparent disorder hides a well-ordered society.

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her fathers footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: The Odd-Job Men
programme.desc: A week in the life of Moha, Valero and Pep - workers in a small plumbing and electricity company in the outskirts of Barcelona, Spain. Moha is on a one-week trial period and is set to replace Pep, but Valero doesn't think he has what it takes.

programme.title: Staring Into The Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a childs disappearance threatens to unravel Wallats entire operation.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Naked King
programme.desc: Captain Kandinsky follows the trail of a mysterious notebook linking unsolved crimes. Guided by Commissioner Macenas clues, Kandinsky begins the hunt for the predator behind all the murders.

programme.title: Erased (2018)
programme.desc: Ana gives birth at a local hospital, but is shocked to find out that her file is no longer on the government network. Without legal status, she must struggle against government bureaucracy to keep her child and her identity.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isnt allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soanes odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Broken Reflections
programme.desc: Tushar, a 17-year-old boy, discovers his mother's extramarital affair on a school bunk which throws him into emotional and psychological turmoil.

programme.title: Cloves & Carnations
programme.desc: In snowy and desolate South Eastern Anatolian, Musa carries the corpse of his deceased wife to their homeland with his granddaughter. As they get closer to a country at war, their run-in with the police separates them in different directions.

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his fathers funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: The Beautiful Spark
programme.desc: After losing his job in a scandal, Michelin-starred chef Philippe gets a second chance at La Belle tincelle - a unique restaurant run by Virginie, and staffed by her autistic son No alongside other young people with disabilities.
